thread.title: Car split in half in crash west of Calgary
thread.title_full: Car split in half in crash west of Calgary

author: Melissa Gilligan
title: Car split in half in crash west of Calgary
text:
February 13, 2017 9:58 am Car split in half in crash west of Calgary By Melissa Gilligan Online Reporter Global News 
A collision west of Calgary on Monday, Feb. 13, 2017 left two vehicles badly damaged. Global News What is this?

Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
Two people were injured in a two-car collision just west of Calgary on Monday that left one car on its roof and the other split in half. 
Emergency crews were called to Highway 22 just north of Highway 8 at around 6:30 a.m. 
EMS said one person was rushed to hospital in serious condition while another other suffered only minor injuries. 
RCMP are investigating what caused the crash to occur.
